document_data.name: Ray of Resurgence
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ray of resurgence''''' was an [[evocation]] spell that produced a beam that restored strength and energy.
document_data.Effects: A glowing ray of yellow light projected from the caster's hand and struck a creature in close range. It never missed and functioned up to 25 feet (7.6 meters) away, or more for more experienced casters. It had a rejuvenating effect, by healing damage to the creature's strength or alleviating effects that sapped strength, and by reducing or eliminating fatigue and exhaustion.
